mapper.sql: id, userId, goodsId, firstSave, balance, historyBalance, saveSum, virtualValue, success, wealthType, price, insertTime
mapper.select: SELECT id, a.userId, goodsId, firstSave, balance, historyBalance, saveSum, virtualValue, success, wealthType, price, a.insertTime,b.nickName from record_virtual a left join user_info b on a.userId = b.userId

mapper.update:
update record_virtual
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
firstSave = #{firstsave,jdbcType=BIT},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
historyBalance = #{historybalance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
saveSum = #{savesum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
virtualValue = #{virtualvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
success = #{success,jdbcType=BIT},
wealthType = #{wealthtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
insertTime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update record_virtual set userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firstSave = #{firstsave,jdbcType=BIT}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, historyBalance = #{historybalance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saveSum = #{savesum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, virtualValue = #{virtualvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, success = #{success,jdbcType=BIT}, wealthType = #{wealthtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insertTime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
